name: limitedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is limited: Although the project was limitedly successful, it was withdrawn after a year. I did some singing growing up and have sung limitedly in some of my other movies.
More examplesFewer examplesInflation can be limitedly controlled by adjusting wages and interest rates to inflation.Better use of otherwise limitedly beneficial cores by software components can improve system-wide performance and reliability.This was an area where international law to presuppose modern sovereign states could be limitedly applied.
